name: Avoid Pumpkins
description:
The main objective in this video game is to collect GOLD box or yellow square and another goal is to avoid PUMPKINS box or square Obstacles as you can. Once a player hits the pumpkin obstacle game is restarts.  

I am a beginner game developer. This is just a test game and I used or learned lots of new stuff mainly post-processing layer, unity particle system, and unity physics also.

Only for WINDOWS !-_-!
